meanings.sent1: The arched bridge looked elegant in the park.
meanings.sent2: The arching tree branches provided shade on a sunny day.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to mimic the arched back of a Halloween decoration.
meanings.sent4: The rainbow arched across the sky after the rainstorm.
meanings.sent5: The arched doorway welcomed visitors into the historic building.

meanings.definition: To bend or curve in the shape of an arch
meanings.sent1: She was arching her back to stretch after sitting for a long time.
meanings.sent2: The gymnast was arching gracefully during her routine.
meanings.sent3: The cat was arching its back playfully while chasing a toy.
meanings.sent4: The road was arching gently as it followed the river's path.
meanings.sent5: He was arching his eyebrows in surprise at the unexpected news.

meanings.definition: The act of forming an arch
meanings.sent1: The arching of the doorway added a touch of elegance to the room.
meanings.sent2: The arching of the bridge was a marvel of engineering.
meanings.sent3: The arching of the cat's back indicated it was feeling threatened.
meanings.sent4: The arching of the rainbow brought joy to everyone who saw it.
meanings.sent5: The arching of the tree branches created a natural canopy overhead.

meanings.definition: A structure that resembles an arch
meanings.sent1: The stone arching over the garden path was a beautiful feature.
meanings.sent2: The metal arching of the sculpture added a modern touch to the park.
meanings.sent3: The arching of the cat's back made it look like a Halloween decoration.
meanings.sent4: The arching of the bridge reflected perfectly in the calm river below.
meanings.sent5: The arching of the rainbow painted a colorful arc in the sky.
